department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3887711410 (Doc3887721135) dated 2023-04-05 with a closing of 2023-05-09 at 2:00 PM EST. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-06-27 at 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Work under this Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) includes the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, transportation, supervision and materials as requested by National Defence (DND) in the form of call-ups for Building Maintenance services for Real Property Operations Group (West) (RPOps(W)) – Det Shilo, Shilo, Manitoba.  Services are to be provided on an “as and when required” basis.
full_summary:
Tottenham International Courtyard 
=========================

Tender Reference: W6896-23S091B

Title: 
=====

English: Construction Maintenance at CFB Shilo
French: L'Entretien du bâtiment à la Base des Forces Canadiennes Shilo

Official Refrence Number: WS3887711410-Doc4042746953

### Solicitation Overview
A request for standing offer (RFSAO) for Building Maintenance at CBF Shilo has been issued.

### Notice Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3887711410
*   **Publication Date:** June 6, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** June 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** April 23, 2028

### Solicitation Method
*   **Procurement Method:** Open Competitive Bidding
*   **Procurement Category:** CNST

### Suppliers/Contractors
The Vendor contracting firm would be expected to provide a team of skilled workers, appropriate tools and equipment, and access to necessary transportation.

### Requirements
The Contractor will provide services for buildings repairs and maintenance on an as and when required basis for Real Property Operations Group (West) - Detachment Shilo. Services would be fulfilled under a standing Offer Agreement (SOA). 

The contractors will prepare, submit and carry out all work.

### Bid Instructions
*   **Amended Closing Time:** Tender closing time has been amended.
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   Eric Kwan (SPAC/PSPC) - technical presenter
    *   email: eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notices

*   This tender closes completely and all tenders must be submitted before 14:00HNE on June 27, 2023.
    Any submitted tenders will be marked non-conform. All required documents are part of the request and must be filled.with and presented.
